## Description {#details}

A nullable <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> handle that is nullable.

This is a value handle that points to a value, and nulls itself out if that value is deleted.

Definition at line 144 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/valuehandle-h">ValueHandle.h</a>.
